keyMoments.title: Pudding Pudding's Debut
keyMoments.description: Marine Commodore Pudding Pudding arrives with the 77th Branch fleet to rescue Gosa Village survivors and capture Arlong.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a Marine officer attempting to enforce justice against Arlong's tyranny.
keyMoments.quote: The 77th Branch is known for its valor!

keyMoments.title: Death of Pudding Pudding
keyMoments.description: Pudding Pudding is shot by Chew and his entire fleet is sunk by Arlong's officers using an artificial maelstrom.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power of the Arlong Pirates and the Marines' inability to protect East Blue citizens.

keyMoments.title: Nami Tells the Crew to Leave
keyMoments.description: Nami coldly confronts the crew and tells them to leave the island, claiming her allegiance to the Arlong Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's internal conflict as she tries to protect the crew by pushing them away.
keyMoments.quote: I'm a member of the Arlong Pirates. Leave this island before you're captured.

keyMoments.title: Nami's Sacrifice for Usopp Revealed
keyMoments.description: Usopp reveals that Nami stabbed her own hand instead of killing him, proving she's still protecting the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the depths of Nami's sacrifice and her true loyalty despite her harsh words.

relationships.description: Luffy refuses to leave without Nami as his navigator, demonstrating his unwavering faith in her.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy refuses to leave the island without Nami despite her harsh rejection.

relationships.description: Nami saved Usopp by stabbing her own hand instead of killing him as ordered.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp reveals that Nami protected him by hurting herself.

reveals.information: Stabbed her own hand to save Usopp while maintaining cover with Arlong
Nojiko begins to explain Nami's past and mentions their adoptive mother Bell-mère

keyMoments.title: Luffy Refuses to Leave
keyMoments.description: Luffy stubbornly refuses to leave the island, lying down and declaring his intention to stay until Nami agrees to be his navigator.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering loyalty and his ability to see through Nami's facade.
keyMoments.quote: I'm not leaving without you as my navigator!

relationships.description: Luffy refuses to abandon Nami, showing his absolute faith in her despite appearances.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy's unwavering determination to make Nami his navigator is solidified.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Reveals He's Alive
keyMoments.description: Usopp appears before the crew, revealing that Nami saved him by stabbing her own hand instead of killing him.
keyMoments.significance: Proves Nami's true character and her ongoing protection of the crew.
keyMoments.quote: Nami stabbed the back of her own hand! She let me escape!

relationships.description: Nami risked her cover to save Usopp's life.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp reveals how Nami saved him, deepening their bond.

reveals.information: Survived the encounter with Nami because she saved him

keyMoments.title: Nojiko Begins to Explain Nami's Past
keyMoments.description: Nojiko offers to tell the crew about Nami's past, mentioning their adoptive mother Bell-mère and the suffering Nami has endured.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the emotional core of the arc by beginning Nami's tragic backstory.
keyMoments.quote: Let me tell you about Nami's past... about our mother, Bell-mère.

relationships.description: Nojiko is Nami's adoptive sister who helps the crew understand Nami's situation.

evolutionMoments.description: Nojiko decides to reveal Nami's painful past to the Straw Hats.

relationships.description: Nojiko's adoptive mother who raised her and Nami.

evolutionMoments.description: Nojiko mentions Bell-mère for the first time to the crew.

reveals.information: Begins revealing that she and Nami were raised by Bell-mère
